sentences: Penelope Jane Smith (born 21 September 1958) is an English television presenter, newsreader and radio presenter.
Penelope Jane Smith (born 21 September 1958) is an English television presenter, newsreader and radio presenter.
Penelope Jane Smith (born 21 September 1958) is an English television presenter, newsreader and radio presenter.
She has presented for Sky News, GMTV, Classic FM, BBC Radio London, talkRADIO and is the current presenter of the weekday drivetime show on Scala Radio.

Smith began her career as a reporter and feature writer on the Peterborough Evening Telegraph in 1977.
